itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the USA Women's World Cup victory and whether or not they should be paid more, what the Kawhi Leonard signing does for the Clippers and the rest of the league, the crazy Home Run Derby last night, and UFC's spectacular card Saturday night including the fastest KO of all time.
